sourcesContent:
import React from "react"
import { Box, Flex ,HStack,Stack, VStack} from "@chakra-ui/layout"
import { Image,Heading,Button,Text,Badge, Avatar  } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import {IoLocationSharp} from "react-icons/io5"
import {MdDriveEta} from "react-icons/md"
import { StarIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"
import { TravelContext } from "../../context/TravelContext"

export const TravelPlan=()=>{

    const {state, dispatch}=useContext(Tra)
    
    return(
        <>
         <Flex alignItems="center" flexDirection="column" boxShadow="lg">
             <Image src="https://www.thexpressng.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/SriLanka_Slider.jpg" alt="Segun Adebayo"  height="400px" width="100%" objectFit="cover"/>
             <Heading  marginTop="-350px" boxShadow="dark-lg" borderRadius="5px" padding="10px" marginBottom="300px">3 Day Trip in Sri Lanka</Heading>
             <Stack direction="row" spacing={4} align="center">

             <Button colorScheme="teal" variant="outline" m="5px">
                    Travel Plan
            </Button>
             </Stack>

        </Flex>


        <Flex flexDirection="column" alignItems="center">

            <HStack> 
                   <IoLocationSharp/> <Badge size="15">9.00 a.m</Badge> <Text fontSize="3xl">Start from colombo</Text>                  
            </HStack>
            <Box color="white" backgroundColor="black" padding={3} >Day 1</Box>
            <PlaceCard/>
            <PlaceCard/>
            <PlaceCard/>
            <PlaceCard/>


            <HStack> 
                   <IoLocationSharp/> <Badge size="15">6.00 p.m</Badge> <Text fontSize="3xl">End - colombo</Text>                  
            </HStack>


            



        </Flex>
        
         
        </>
    )
}

const PlaceCard=()=>{
    return(
        <Flex flexDirection="column" alignItems="center" padding="10px">
                        <HStack>< MdDriveEta /> <Text fontSize="2xl">10 KM </Text> </HStack>
                        <Badge size="15">1 hour</Badge>



                        <Flex flexDirection="row" margin={5} borderWidth="1px" borderRadius="lg" p={5} >
                           <Image src={"https://bit.ly/2Z4KKcF"}  width="400px" height="300px" objectFit="cover" borderRadius="lg"  />
                           <VStack spacing={3.5} alignItems="start" p={5}>
                                 <Avatar name="1"  />
                                <Box lineHeight="tall" fontWeight="semibold" as="h4"> Hanthana Mountain Sri Lanka </Box>
                                <Box color="gray.600" fontSize="sm">Upper Hanthana Rd</Box>
                                <HStack><Badge borderRadius="full" px="2" colorScheme="teal">tourist_attraction</Badge>
                                         <Badge borderRadius="full" px="2" colorScheme="teal">point_of_interest</Badge>
                                         <Badge borderRadius="full" px="2" colorScheme="teal">tourist_attraction</Badge>
                                </HStack>

                                <HStack>
                                        <StarIcon color={"teal.500"} />
                                        <StarIcon color={"teal.500"} />
                                        <StarIcon color={"teal.500"} />
                                        <StarIcon color={"teal.500"} />
                                        <StarIcon color={"teal.500"} />
                                        <Box>rating 5</Box>
                                        
                                </HStack>
                                        <Button colorScheme="teal" variant="outline">
                                            See more...
                                        </Button>

                           </VStack>

                        </Flex>


            </Flex>
    )
}
